abstract: Wal-Mart announces the resignation of Ed Chan and Clara Wong, two top executives in China, just one week after city of Chongqing ordered the closing of all 13 stores as punishment for a series of food handling and mislabeling violations; company says timing is a coincidence
snippet: A company spokesman said the resignations were not related to a recent punishment over mislabeled pork at 13 Wal-Mart stores.
lead_paragraph: A company spokesman said the resignations were not related to a recent punishment over mislabeled pork at 13 Wal-Mart stores.

headline.main: Two Top Executives Resign From Wal-Mart China
headline.print_headline: Two Top Executives Resign From Posts At Wal-Mart China
headline.seo: Two Wal-Mart China Executives Resign Posts
